description: The principle of fairness, ensuring every individual is treated with equal respect and dignity under the law.
The ability to act, speak, and think without restraint, ensuring the rights of individuals are preserved.
The system of laws established in ancient Sumer that served as the basis for fairness, justice, and order.
The belief that America has a unique role to play in world history, guided by principles of liberty, democracy, and justice.
Honesty and integrity in all aspects of life, ensuring transparency and authenticity in communication and actions.
The value of being independent and self-sufficient, believing that individuals should take responsibility for their own success.
The drive to create new solutions, challenge old norms, and push the boundaries of what is possible.
Acting with moral principles, keeping promises, and always doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
Working together with others to achieve common goals and fostering a sense of unity and cooperation.
The determination to keep moving forward, no matter the obstacles, and the strength to overcome challenges.
